name: Fused
description: NF-01, A Nanobyte who refers himself as Nigel, is spawned after a cascade failure within the Skystar System. His duty is to navigate through the system levels to fix the fuses, avoid the damaged shock traps and bring the system back online.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: (Requires 64-Bit) Windows 7 and above Processor: Duel Core Processor 3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 or similar DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible 16-bit Sound Card Additional Notes: 64-Bit operating system is required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: (Requires 64-Bit) Windows 7 and above Processor: Quad Core Processor 4GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or similar DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible 16-bit Sound Card Additional Notes: 64-Bit operating system is required
